item.description: I don’t want to achieve immortality through my work; I want to achieve immortality through not dying. I don’t want to live on in the hearts of my countrymen; I want to live on in my apartment.
Broad funnel, tight filter “Research widely, select carefully. Broad funnel, tight filter.” —[[James Clear]] See: [[Research]] [[Garbage in, garbage out]]
Building habits in the present helps you to do more of what you want in the future. —[[James Clear]], [[Atomic Habits]]
“The second half of a man’s life is made up of nothing but the habits he has acquired during the first half.
Embarassing moments saying no versus saying yes “Most of the embarrassing moments of my life happened when I wanted to say no, but ended up saying yes (or saying nothing at all).
Raise your ambitions. Lower your expectations. “Raise your ambitions. Lower your expectations. The higher your ambitions, the bolder your actions.
Deconstruction creates knowledge. Recombination creates value. —[[James Clear]]
If you’re unwilling to adapt to the future, you’ll justify the past. —[[James Clear]] On [[A closed fist cannot receive]].
Make mistakes, just don’t make them permanent. “Make mistakes, just don’t make them permanent.” —[[James Clear]]
